    variety of performances

    Music matters:
     you make it possible

    For over a century, the San Francisco Symphony has been a source of pride, culture, and transformation in the Bay Area. Become a donor and be instrumental to everything the San Francisco Symphony does.

    press release

    MTT inducted into the California Hall of Fame

    On Tuesday December 5th, San Francisco Symphony Music Director Michael Tilson Thomas (MTT) was inducted into the California Hall of Fame along with fellow inductees Steven Spielberg, Lucille Ball and many others.
